abstract: Graham Parker, general manager of classical radio station WQXR, says best things about his three-bedroom Hudson Heights apartment are its great light, huge foyer and inviting semi-circular couch.

headline.print_headline: A Home With an Open-Door Policy
headline.main: WQXR’s Graham Parker in Hudson Heights

snippet: Graham Parker, the general manager of the public radio station WQXR, and his psychologist husband, Adam Benson, were drawn to their apartment’s light, scale and flow.
lead_paragraph: Graham Parker, the general manager of the public radio station WQXR, and his psychologist husband, Adam Benson, were drawn to their apartment’s light, scale and flow.
